name: BUG Outbreak
description:
BUG Outbreak is a game written in python language.

In this game you have two levels. The first level has 25 insects which you need to kill with three weapons spray, shotgun and Uzi. After finishing of level 1 you will transferred to level two, where you have life and you need to destroy the BUG stone. Your life will be diminished every time when the BUG king makes a wish. You cannot kill the king but you can destroy the stone. The stone is moving randomly in front of you.  To move the gun press the up and down arrow. To fire the gun press space and to change the weapon press w.

Uzi can kill beetles, bug Spray can kill house flies and shotgun can kill earthworm.

The source code, license and credits are available in the github repo:

https://github.com/Shreejan-35/BUG-OUTBREAK
